msg: modified the way to get stored rampart context. Broken due to fix of AXIS2C-1161 (Axis2/C revision 666517)

author: doronc
msg: LUCENE-1303: BoostingTermQuery's explanation marked as a Match
depending only upon the non-payload part of the score.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-582: Added total processed time. Applied patch with thanks to William Tam.

author: zhen
msg: Implemented the rest of the URL template features: "-opt", "-neg", "-list", "-join".
Refactored the bind() method for a smaller code size (at the price of less readability).

author: joerg
msg: With minimum Java raised to 1.4.2 it is no longer necessary to have JDK-specific source directories.
